title: PayU | Associate Software Engineer- Java | Rejected
content:
College: Tier 1
Education: BTECH'23 (Non Tech Branch)
Years of Experience: 3 Months
Prior Experience: 6 Month of Internship
Date of the Offer: 1st May, 2024
Company: PayU
Title/Level: Associate Software Enginner - Role
Location: Gurugram
Base Salary:  13 LPA
Annual Bonus: 1.3 LPA 
Total comp (Base + Bonus ): 14.3 LPA


P.S. : They are not offering the CTC as per their standards,so I Rejected the offer. If anyone know the reason,please comment
